quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
name: Unknown

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
name: Malcolm X

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
name: Buddha

quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
name: Bernard Meltzer

quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: We must vote for hope, vote for life, vote for a brighter future for all of our loved ones.
name: Ed Markey

quote: I'm looking forward to the future, and feeling grateful for the past.
name: Mike Rowe

quote: No dream is too big. No challenge is too great. Nothing we want for our future is beyond our reach.
name: Donald Trump

quote: Yesterday's the past, tomorrow's the future, but today is a gift. That's why it's called the present.
name: Bil Keane

quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Education is the foundation upon which we build our future.
name: Christine Gregoire

quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Depression is the inability to construct a future.
name: Rollo May

quote: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: I am grateful for all the moments that I have, and I'm moving forward one step at a time to the future.
name: Park Bo-gum

quote: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.
name: Ann Landers

quote: The future will either be green or not at all.
name: Bob Brown

quote: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future.
name: Walt Disney

quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
name: Malcolm X

quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: A revolution is a struggle to the death between the future and the past.
name: Fidel Castro

quote: The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
name: Mike Murdock

quote: Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
name: Alan Lakein

quote: Memories are the key not to the past, but to the future.
name: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: The youth is the hope of our future.
name: Jose Rizal

quote: The future is green energy, sustainability, renewable energy.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Without memory, there is no culture. Without memory, there would be no civilization, no society, no future.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: The past, like the future, is indefinite and exists only as a spectrum of possibilities.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: There is always one moment in childhood when the door opens and lets the future in.
name: Graham Greene

quote: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: We drive into the future using only our rearview mirror.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: Science is the key to our future, and if you don't believe in science, then you're holding everybody back.
name: Bill Nye

quote: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Control your own destiny or someone else will.
name: Jack Welch

quote: Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past.
name: George Orwell

quote: Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself.
name: Andrew Carnegie

quote: If we open a quarrel between past and present, we shall find that we have lost the future.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life.
name: Plato

quote: Knowing your HIV status is so important for your future health and that of your loved ones.
name: David Furnish

quote: If you see the magic in a fairy tale, you can face the future.
name: Danielle Steel

quote: Imagination is the only key to the future. Without it none exists - with it all things are possible.

quote: The danger of the past was that men became slaves. The danger of the future is that men may become robots.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: When I look into the future, it's so bright it burns my eyes.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Even though the future seems far away, it is actually beginning right now.

quote: Dreams about the future are always filled with gadgets.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: The future doesn't belong to the fainthearted; it belongs to the brave.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Study the past, if you would divine the future.
name: Confucius

quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
name: Philip Emeagwali

quote: The past explains how I got here, but the future is up to me - and I love to live life at full throttle.

quote: The only thing we know about the future is that it will be different.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: I am not interested in the past, except as the road to the future.
name: Gianni Versace

quote: Choose your friends with caution; plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Forget the past - the future will give you plenty to worry about.
name: George Allen, Sr.

quote: If there is a future, it will be Green.
name: Petra Kelly

quote: Only you can control your future.
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: When the past no longer illuminates the future, the spirit walks in darkness.
name: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Education, therefore, is a process of living and not a preparation for future living.
name: John Dewey

quote: In the future, everyone will be famous for 15 minutes.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: A women who doesn't wear perfume has no future.

quote: The present was an egg laid by the past that had the future inside its shell.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Solar energy is bound to be in our future. There's a kind of inevitability about it.

quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.

quote: Everything is a railway junction where past and future are sliding over one another, not touching.

quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.

quote: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.

quote: Technology and robotics are advancing and will reduce the need for workers in the future.

quote: Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.

quote: Right actions in the future are the best apologies for bad actions in the past.

name: Bob Marley

quote: The future starts today, not tomorrow.

quote: We - the current generation - have a moral responsibility to make the world better for future generations.

quote: And all your future lies beneath your hat.
name: John Oldham

quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Biodiversity starts in the distant past and it points toward the future.

name: Winston Churchill

quote: If you want a vision of the future, imagine a boot stamping on a human face - forever.

quote: Education is not only a ladder of opportunity, but it is also an investment in our future.

quote: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.

quote: If humanity doesn't land on Mars in my lifetime, I would be very disappointed.
name: Elon Musk

quote: School is practice for the future, and practice makes perfect. But nobody's perfect, so why practice?

quote: The future enters into us, in order to transform itself in us, long before it happens.

name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: No matter what happens to me and my career in the future, Berlin is always going to be my hometown.

quote: We have to do with the past only as we can make it useful to the present and the future.

quote: They might in the future more than ever before engage in hunting beavers.

quote: Our greatest motivation in life comes from not knowing the future.

quote: I don't try to describe the future. I try to prevent it.

quote: Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.

quote: The future will be better tomorrow.

quote: Without forgiveness, there's no future.

name: Paul Allen

quote: When all else is lost, the future still remains.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: You never know what the future holds or where my life will take me.
name: Kim Kardashian

name: Ray Bradbury

name: Richard Dawkins

quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.

quote: The future is like heaven, everyone exalts it, but no one wants to go there now.
name: James Baldwin

quote: It is only by reflecting on the past that one can create a better future.
name: Rithy Panh

quote: Every one rushes elsewhere and into the future, because no one wants to face one's own inner self.

name: Bill Gates

quote: God is more interested in your future and your relationships than you are.

quote: If you're not looking toward the future or trying to improve the current technology, you'll be left behind.
name: Gwynne Shotwell

quote: If you don't focus on the future generation, it means you are destroying your country.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The trouble with the future is that it usually arrives before we're ready for it.
name: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Living in dreams of yesterday, we find ourselves still dreaming of impossible future conquests.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: You can expect interior enforcement actions in the future.
name: Asa Hutchinson

quote: If anybody was to look towards a big source of demand in future, it would be hard for them to miss India.
name: Raghuram Rajan

quote: As a small country, both in size and population, our future hinges on the quality of our people.
name: Hassanal Bolkiah

quote: I guess short films have a bright future... The advantage is budget.
name: Anurag Kashyap

quote: The future will be the child of the past and the present, even if a rebellious child.
name: George Crumb

quote: What you're doing now, or have done in the past, need not determine what you can do next and in the future.
name: Ken Robinson

quote: The enemies of the future are always the very nicest people.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: Longevity in this business is about being able to reinvent yourself or invent the future.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: Cease to inquire what the future has in store, and take as a gift whatever the day brings forth.
name: Horace

quote: For all of its uncertainty, we cannot flee the future.
name: Barbara Jordan

quote: Children are our future we must take care of them with maximum effort.
name: Naomi Campbell

quote: I'm a goal-oriented person, and instead of focusing on the past, I'd rather focus on the future.
name: CM Punk

quote: You have to be constantly reinventing yourself and investing in the future.
name: Reid Hoffman

quote: When did the future switch from being a promise to a threat?
name: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: The Christian of the future will be a mystic or he will not exist at all.
name: Karl Rahner

quote: Preparing for a future in music is an expensive proposition.
name: Itzhak Perlman

quote: The future is always beginning now.
name: Mark Strand

quote: We steal if we touch tomorrow. It is God's.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The future has already arrived. It's just not evenly distributed yet.
name: William Gibson

quote: I will do everything I can in future to help this great country succeed.
name: David Cameron

quote: From my youth, I'd never stopped thinking in the future tense.
name: Paul Allen

quote: I've always worked hard and played hard, and I'm sure I'll be cleaning up my act in the future.
name: Michael Douglas

quote: We should regret our mistakes and learn from them, but never carry them forward into the future with us.
name: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quote: What the future of the planet and music and art and all of it is sharing; it's diversity.
name: Taj Mahal

quote: I can't change history, I don't want to change history. I can only change the future. I'm working on that.
name: Boris Becker

quote: Sometimes you can win, but you are not building something positive for your future.
name: Antonio Conte

quote: It's easy to look into the future and worry about the past.
name: Mirai Nagasu

quote: I want to live in a city where the future is being mapped out.
name: Jim Crace

quote: Social democracy does not represent an ideal future; it does not even represent the ideal past.
name: Tony Judt

quote: Even in my darkest times I knew I had a good future ahead of me.
name: Balthazar Getty

quote: One faces the future with one's past.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: The future has a way of arriving unannounced.
name: George Will

quote: Tomorrow is no man's gift.
name: Gilbert Parker

quote: What else does anxiety about the future bring you but sorrow upon sorrow?
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: The word tomorrow was invented for indecisive people and for children.
name: Ivan Turgenev

quote: Predictions are preposterous.
name: Jackie Mason

quote: I think that we're living in a time where there are trillion-dollar opportunities that never existed before.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: They gave each other a smile with a future in it.
name: Ring Lardner

quote: But I dare not think too far into the future on the risk that I'll miss the present.
name: Colin Farrell

quote: We grow in time to trust the future for our answers.
name: Ruth Benedict

quote: I have no plans, and no plans to plan.
name: Mario Cuomo

quote: It looks like the future's really bright.
name: Michael P. Anderson
